metadata.name: Conviction
metadata.description:
Monika Ertl, daughter of a Nazi that fled to South America after the war, fell in love with a guerrillero.

He was hunted down and killed. She wrote a farewell letter to him „Christ with a gun, crucified by bullets“

The man responsible was promoted to consul in Hamburg, Germany. 
A few months later he was shot dead by a German looking visitor.

Back home, Monika,  the „avenger of Ché Guevara“, was found, tortured and shot. 

The traitor? An old friend of the family, secretly working for the CIA. 
Klaus Barbie, the butcher of Lyon.

----------------------------------

This was found at the crime scene: https://gateway.pinata.cloud/ipfs/QmSvMrudYCdQ9Egj8WWL1VQvueqL8L5udLExJtn9c4jAtP

And I always thought it to be an incredibly powerful picture. 

From it, I crafted a totem. 

In honor of all the women who struggle, and who nevertheless push through with unwavering courage and conviction.

----------------------------------

Sound by Michael Akstaller
